lyrics:
7 contributorscaptain kellyâ€™s kitchen lyricsverse 1
come single guy and gal unto me pay attention
dont ever fall in love its the devils own invention
for once he fell in love with a maiden so bewitching
miss henrietta bell down in captain kellys kitchen

refrain
with me toora loora la me toora loora laddie
me toora loora la and me toora loora laddie

verse 2
at the age of seventeen i apprenticed to a grocer
not far from stephens green where miss henri used to go sir
her manners were sublime she set my heart atwitchin
when she invited me to a party in the kitchen

refrain
with me toora loora la me toora loora laddie
me toora loora la and me toora loora laddie

verse 3
sunday was the day that they were to have their flareup
he dressed himself quite gay i frizzed and oiled my hair up
the captain had no wife and he had gone afishin
she groped me on the stairs beneath the old mans kitchen
see dropkick murphys liveget tickets as low as 40you might also likerefrain
with me toora loora la me toora loora laddie
me toora loora la and me toora loora laddie

verse 4
her arms around my waist she slyly hinted marriage
when to the door in haste came captain kellys carriage
her eyes were full of hate and poison she was spittin
the captain kicked the door in and stormed into the kitchen

refrain
with me toora loora la me toora loora laddie
me toora loora la and me toora loora laddie

verse 5
when the captain came downstairs he saw my situation
in spite of all his prayers he was marched off to the station
for him theyd take no bail to get home i was itchin
he had to tell the tale how i came into the kitchen

refrain
with me toora loora la me toora loora laddie
me toora loora la and me toora loora laddie

verse 6
i said she did invite me but she gave flat denial
for assault she did indict me and i was sent for trial
she swore hed robbed her house in spite of all her screechin
i got six months hard for his courtin in the kitchen
refrain
with me toora loora la me toora loora laddie
me toora loora la and me toora loora laddieembed
